name: Acurast Lite - Debug Script
description: Debug version to identify where the script is failing
author: Cellhasher User
preRunNotice: Debug script to identify failure point
pythonScript:
import os
print('[DEBUG] Script started')

# Try to import requests for better SSL handling
try:
    import requests
    HAS_REQUESTS = True
    print('[DEBUG] Requests library available')
except ImportError as e:
    HAS_REQUESTS = False
    print(f'[DEBUG] Requests library not available: {e}')

print('[DEBUG] Getting environment variables')
# Get environment variables from Cellhasher
ADB = os.environ.get('adb_path', 'adb')
devices = os.environ.get('devices', '').split()
APK_URL = os.environ.get('apk_url', '')
APK_NAME = os.environ.get('apk_name', '')

print(f'[DEBUG] ADB: {ADB}')
print(f'[DEBUG] devices: {devices}')
print(f'[DEBUG] APK_URL: {APK_URL}')
print(f'[DEBUG] APK_NAME: {APK_NAME}')
print(f'[DEBUG] HAS_REQUESTS: {HAS_REQUESTS}')

print('[DEBUG] Script completed successfully')
